casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David FELTON. No. 186P10-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of September <page vol="778" reporter="S.E.2d" no="275" /> 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
